name: Legend of Valadria
description:
First of all thank you for checking out my game!

This game is not completed yet and some things aren't working the way they're supposed to (loading in the main menu, proper reloading of levels). I'm uploading this because I hope to get some good feedback and maybe some tips to make the game better. I'm not sure if I will implement the feedback in this game or make a new game completely since I haven't really worked on this in a while.

Anyway I hope you enjoy the game for what it is!
